98780.name: Global biomass
98780.description: Global biomass of taxonomic groups, measured in tonnes of carbon.
98780.datasetName: Biomass and taxa abundance (Bar-On et al. 2018)
98780.s_name: Biomass and taxa abundance (Bar-On et al. 2018)

source.name: Biomass and taxa abundance (Bar-On et al. 2018)
source.dataPublishedBy: Bar-On, Y. M., Phillips, R., & Milo, R. (2018). The biomass distribution on Earth. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, 201711842.
source.additionalInfo:
Estimates of the global biomass (measured in tonnes of carbon) and abundance (number of individuals) of different taxonomic groups.

Due to large uncertainty for some groups, these are used as order-of-magnitude estimates and come with notable error margins.

98781.name: Abundance of organisms
98781.description: Global number of individuals of a given taxonomic group.
98781.datasetName: Biomass and taxa abundance (Bar-On et al. 2018)
98781.s_name: Biomass and taxa abundance (Bar-On et al. 2018)

Due to large uncertainty for some groups, these are used as order-of-magnitude estimates and come with notable error margins.
